thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Was very good
thread.title_full: Was very good - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: cheezewiz
title: Was very good
text: Just did an overnight there, but was good. Check in was fast, efficient. Room was a typical Westin. Although I did have a great view of a roof (339) I was not there for sight seeing. Very good toiletries, Tea tree everything. The lounge though,,,was fantastic. Food was a little pricey, but good. Bartender took the time to know my name. If I could make one suggestion? The little creamers for the coffee (x2) was not sufficient, but the front desk was very helpful in locating a few more. I would stay here again
